name: 人物攻击
note:
<Critical Multiplier: 150%>

<Weapon Ranged>
<setup action>
clear battle log
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<whole action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 15
else
  perform start
end
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: target
</whole action>

<target action>
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

name: 防御
note: 1 号技能会在选择“防御”指令时使用。

name: 烈焰一击
note:
<Enemy or Actor Select>
<Weapon Range>
<Cast Animation: 0>

<Weapon Ranged>

<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<whole action>
jump user: 200%, 20
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 20
else
  perform start
end
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: target
</whole action>

<target action>
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
animation 8: targets
wait for animation
action effect
immortal: targets, false
</target action>

description: 免除一名队友受到的负面效果
name: 水银净化
note: <Cast Animation: 124>

description: 给予对方单体致命真实伤害
name: 利刃华尔兹
note:
<Whole Action>
Battleback 3 add: battlebacks1, DarkSpace
Battleback 4 add: battlebacks2, DarkSpace
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 10
else
  perform start
end
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: target
</Whole Action>

<target action>
opacity not focus: 0, 60
wait for opacity
move user: targets, back, 5
wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user
action animation
ani wait: 2
action effect
move user: targets, front center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back top, 5
face user: target
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, front, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, top, 5
wait for movement
move user: targets, front, 5
immortal: target, false
jump user: 200%, 10
face user: forward
wait for movement 
animation 278: targets
tint screen: sunset
wait for animation
flash screen: red, 20
wait: 10
enemy effect: targets, blink
action effect
show battle hud
tint screen: normal, 30
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
wait for opacity
</target action>

<Follow Action>
Battleback 3 Remove
Battleback 4 Remove
</Follow Action>

name: 祈愿
note:
<setup action>
display action
perform start
motion standby: user
wait for movement
Animation 122: user
Wait For Animation
Battleback 3 add: battlebacks1, Translucent
Battleback 4 add: battlebacks2, DemonCastle1
wait 10
</setup action>

<whole action>
Animation 36: user
Wait For Animation

Animation 97: enemies
Wait For Animation
Add State 27: enemies
wait 20

action animation
Wait For Animation
action effect
wait 20
</whole action>

<target action>
</target action>

<Follow Action>
Battleback 3 Remove
Battleback 4 Remove
</Follow Action>

name: 演示技能1-终结剑技
note:
<Setup Action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
perform start
wait for movement
</Setup Action>

<Whole Action>
hide battle hud
cast animation
wait for animation
zoom: 1.5
camera focus: target
wait for camera
move user: target, base, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, center, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, head, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, front base, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, front center, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, front head, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, back head, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, back base, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
move user: target, back center, 10
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
wait: 4
reset camera
reset zoom
move user: return
</Whole Action>


<Target Action>
perform action
motion wait: user
animation 25: targets
tint screen: sunset
wait for animation
flash screen: red, 20
shake screen: 10, 10, 30
wait: 20
enemy effect: targets, blink
action animation: enemies
action animation: enemies
action animation: enemies
action animation: enemies
action effect: enemies
action effect: enemies
action effect: enemies
action effect: enemies
show battle hud
tint screen: normal, 30
wait: 30
</Target Action>
